mapper.select: SELECT pm.ID , pt.TICKETNO , pt.SCREENDATENO ,pt.SCREENNO ,pt.SEATNO ,pt.AGE ,pr.SCORE FROM P_MEMBER pm ,P_TICKET pt ,P_REVIEW pr WHERE pt.ID = pm.ID AND pt.TICKETNO =pr.TICKETNO(+) AND pm.ID = #{id} ORDER BY pt.TICKETNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P_TICKET ( ID, TICKETNO, SCREENDATENO, SCREENNO, SEATNO, AGE, MID) VALUES ( #{id}, ( CONCAT('T', (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TICKETNO ,2))),0)+1, 3, '0') FROM P_TICKET))), ( SELECT SCREENDATENO FROM P_SCREENDATE WHERE SCREENTIME =TO_DATE(#{year}||#{month}||#{day}||#{hour}||#{minute}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND MID = #{mid} AND SCREENNO = #{screenNO} AND ROWNUM = 1 ), #{screenNO}, #{seat}, #{age}, #{mid} )
